task.title: How to make a Ham, Cheese, and Egg Burrito

context.p:
Ingridients
1 whole egg
3 egg whites
6 slices of Deli Fresh Smoke Ham, chopped
2 whole wheat tortillas (8 inch)
Â¼ shredded Cheddar Cheese

step.cmd: Beat whole egg, egg whites and ham until blended.
Heat pan on medium-high heat and spray with cooking spray.
Add egg mixture and cook for 3 minutes stirring the mixture occasionally.
Spoon the egg mixture and place it down the center of the tortillas.
Place cheese on top of the egg.
Fold in opposite sides of each tortilla, then roll it up burrito-style.
